definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Their technique preferences are both brush stroke mainly expressed in color, and fine brushwork together with freehand brushwork.
sentences.chinese: 从表现技法看，大多偏爱工笔和兼工带写的方法。

sentences.english: It is a typical imperial-court decorative painting of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 该画为典型的宋代院体画，是工笔重彩画中的佳作。

sentences.english: The third chapter makes the comparison of past and present to the exquisite brush portrait's development.
sentences.chinese: 第三章对工笔人物画的发展做今昔对比。

sentences.english: Meticulous heavy color painting will emerge in the painting later gradually moves toward the decline.
sentences.chinese: 工笔重彩画在文人画兴起以后逐步走向衰落。

sentences.english: This is the base of Fine-Brush Animal Painting.
sentences.chinese: 这里是工笔动物画基地。

sentences.english: Great efforts have been made to reliably identify handprinted Chinese characters during the last three decades.
sentences.chinese: 近三十年的研究，主要集中在工笔手写汉字识别方面。

sentences.english: Decorative is a major feature of Chinese Painting.
sentences.chinese: 装饰性是工笔画的一大特点。

sentences.english: Guangming Daily published "Do not build the Painting, " works and articles.
sentences.chinese: 光明日报发表《莫建成的工笔画》的作品和文章。

sentences.english: It resembles the freehand traditional Chinese painting and also shows the delicacy of the linear sketch.
sentences.chinese: 既似国画大写意之手法，又似工笔素描之纤细。

sentences.english: This essay is divided into three sections. The first section is about the civilian characteristic of Song dynasty Gongbi portraitist.
sentences.chinese: 宋代工笔人物画的平民化特点。

sentences.english: Li Jike was a famous painter of meticulous painting drawing.
sentences.chinese: 李际科是著名的工笔画家。

sentences.english: FeiChang-Yu fine brushwork of contemporary artist representation of important bird and flower painting.
sentences.chinese: 于非暗是当代工笔花鸟画的重要代表性画家。

sentences.english: Liu Dawei is a versatile artists, re-color and fine brushwork and freehand fine ink.
sentences.chinese: 刘大为是全能型画家，工笔重彩和水墨写意兼精。

sentences.english: Allow me to paint you a London in detail.
sentences.chinese: 请让我在等待中帮你们描绘一幅工笔的伦敦。

sentences.english: She is an expert in watercolor and fine brushwork paintings.
sentences.chinese: 主要擅长工笔画和水彩画。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art)/picture created using this technique
to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
